Gives movement to nearby religious units.
Gives additional combat strength to nearby religious units.
+1 Movement
+5 Strength
+2 [ICON_Movement] Movement and +2 sight range while embarked.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Ignore additional [ICON_Movement] Movement costs from embarking and disembarking.
Protects nearby Trade units from being Plundered on Water Tiles.
Trade units near a your Bireme are immune to being Plundered on Water Tiles.
+2 [ICON_Movement] Movement and +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength to Levied units.
+3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength from each adjacent Levied unit.
+3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength from each active Alliance.
Can create a National Park.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting within 2 tiles of a National Park.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting within 2 tiles of a National Park owned by you.
Protects nearby land Trade units from Plunder.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain [ICON_GOLD] Gold equal to 100% that unit's base [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.
This Mandekalu Cavalry protects nearby Trade units from being Plundered on Land Tiles.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain [ICON_GOLD] Gold equal to 100% that unit's base [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.
Trade units near a your Mandekalu Cavalry are immune to being Plundered on Land Tiles.
Starts with a free promotion.
+1 additional attack per turn if unit has not used all its movement.
+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength vs. district defenses. (Great Turkish Bombard)
+3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength per unused [ICON_Movement] Movement.
It costs no [ICON_Movement] Movement to coastal raid.
Even without Open Borders, this unit can enter foreign territory.
+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when in your territory or adjacent to your territory from Finest Hour
+10 [ICON_Strength] Combat against units from the Information and Future Eras from Cyber Warfare.
Adjacent enemy units receive -5 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Can build the unique Pā improvement.
+2 [ICON_Movement] Movement when embarked.
Resistant to Weapons of Mass Destruction.
Able to move and fight in water.
-3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength from Digital Democracy.
When adjacent to an enemy city, melee and anti-cavalry units do full damage to the city's Walls. Does not affect cities with Medieval or Renaissance Walls. Ineffective against Urban Defenses.
When adjacent to an enemy city, friendly melee and anti-cavalry units can bypass the city walls and attack the city directly. Does not affect cities with Renaissance Walls. Ineffective against Urban Defenses.
+3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for all naval units. (Rajendra Chola)
+1 sight range for all naval units. (Leif Erikson)
